title: nftAno - Bring your CNFT !
description: The CNFT movement is at a fast pace, there is no unique "hub" of information where you can socialize/find out about new artists/projects.

f6_assessments.q0: A good idea, though it is not worth the extensive costs mentioned in this proposal. Such a project can be achieved with far lower costs.
f6_assessments.q1: While the plan is there and sifficiently detailed, there is not really sufficient info about the proposer and his qualifications. The hourly rates planned for this project are really high and hard to justify for a project being paid for by funding that needs to pay for many more projects.
f6_assessments.q2: While milestones are set, there is no timeline for the project, and defined objectives could be more thoroughly explained.

solution:
User-friendly Platform (mobile/web)

\- Check/Promote/Lend/Organize your own NFT's Gallery

\- Follow other users accounts / Like and Comment
experience:
12 years of project management experience within the IT Retail Banking domain.

Fluent in English, Spanish, Portuguese.
